segments.text: Is there any cable for the Internet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much do I need to pay for it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there a mailbox in the apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are there any parking lots for the tenants ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But you need to pay $ 60 for it each month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there an alarm system in the apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . We set up the new alarm system a few months ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who will take responsibility for the heating system if it has a problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course we do . It is the landlord â€™ s responsibility .
segments.speaker: S2
